meta.description: Explore our weekly yoga class schedule in Mexico City. Find your perfect practice time.

hero.title: Our Classes
hero.subtitle: Find your practice in our weekly schedule

intro.text: Join us for transformative yoga classes throughout the week. Each session is carefully designed to meet you wherever you are on your journey.

legend.title: Class Types
legend.subtitle: Each class type offers a unique experience

kundalini.name: Kundalini Yoga
kundalini.description: Awaken your inner energy through breathwork, movement, and meditation

vinyasa.name: Vinyasa Flow
vinyasa.description: Dynamic sequences synchronized with breath for strength and focus

hatha.name: Hatha Yoga
hatha.description: Foundational practice focusing on postures and breathing techniques

aerial.name: Aerial Yoga
aerial.description: Experience yoga suspended in silk hammocks for a unique practice

cta.title: Ready to Begin?
cta.text: Join us for a class and discover the transformative power of yoga. Contact us to learn more about our schedule and upcoming sessions.
